DOC.brief_summary: Study healthy male assess bioavailability 4 different fostamatinib tablet
DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Males Assess Bioavailability 4 Different Fostamatinib Tablets
DOC.criteria: Weight least 50 kg body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 35.0 kg/m2 inclusive Volunteers must willing use barrier contraception ie , condom , Day 1 Treatment Period 1 2 week final dose investigational product ( IP ) History clinically significant disease disorder History presence GI , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug ( except cholecystectomy ) Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration drug Volunteers smoke 5 cigarette equivalent tobacco per day Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , hematology urinalysis result judge Investigator
